Articles.Content:
My rocket exploded and caught a good banner for MechJeb lol

![vo91kw.png](http://i62.tinypic.com/vo91kw.png)
"Did you know that MechJeb includes onboard rocket engines and standard delta wings for rapid escape of Jeb's brain?"
Make it into a meme... It's a perfect subject

I made it into a meme...

a Horrible ugly one

but a meme nonetheless

![sy4hvAO.png](http://i.imgur.com/sy4hvAO.png)

- - - Updated - - -

P.S. if this happens on the ground mechjeb will roll forward forever until he reaches water.![:huh:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_undecided.gif)
